page.title: 13INDUSTRY
page.content: GOUROCK IS NOT AN INDUSTRIAL TOWN,BUT IT HAS SOME INDUSTRY. ONE EXAMPLE IS ADAMS BOATYARD WHICH REPAIRS SHIPS FOR THE MINISTRY OF DEFENCE. ADAMS GET ABOUT TWO BOATS A MONTH TO REPAIR. THEY DO NOT BUILD SHIPS ANY LONGER BUT BUILD STEEL STRUCTURES. NATIONAL SEMI CONDUCTORS IS A RELATIVELY NEW INDUSTRY TO THE AREA,WHICH MAKES SEMI CONDUCTORS FOR IBM AND THE POST OFFICE. THE COMPANY IS OF AMERICAN ORIGIN.THIS IS THE FIRMS ONLY SCOTTISH PLANT WHICH EMPLOYS AROUND 1600 PEOPLE.IN THE PAST FEW WEEKS MANY HAVE LOST THEIR JOBS DUE TO A SLUMP IN THE MARKET FOR THE PRODUCT. AT THE EASTERN END OF THE AREA IS TATE AND LYLE'S WESTBURN SUGAR REFINERY. THIS IS THE ONLY REFINERY LEFT IN GREENOCK AND OWES ITS ORIGINS TO EARLY TRADE WITH THE AMERICAS.
